Trigger.Name: 死而不僵
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1A:.{8}:(?<CasterName>[^:]+?) gains the effect of (?<AbilityName>死而不僵|Walking Dead|ウォーキングデッド) from

Trigger.Name: 巨龙视线
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 1A:.{8}:(?<name>[^:]+?) gains the effect of (巨龙左眼|竜の左眼|Left Eye|巨龙右眼|巨龙左眼|Right Eye) from

Trigger.Name: 进攻之探戈
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{27}(?<name>[^:]+?) gains the effect of (攻めのタンゴ|进攻之探戈|Devilment) from.*?for 20\.00 Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: Clear
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^.{14} 00:0039:(?:进入了休息区。|You have entered a sanctuary\.|レストエリアに入った！)$|^.{14} 21:.{8}:400000(03|1[026])
